title: Bug 49536: Returning 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the system returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an expected HTTP error 404.
EB: The system should return a HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance
4. Observe that the system returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of a HTTP error 404.
